name: MTLSamplerBorderColor
desc: Values that determine the border color for clamped texture values when the sampler address mode is MTLSamplerAddressMode.clampToBorderColor.

items.name: case transparentBlack
items.desc: A transparent black color (0,0,0,0) for texture values outside the border.

items.name: case opaqueBlack
items.desc: An opaque black color (0,0,0,1) for texture values outside the border

items.name: case opaqueWhite
items.desc: An opaque white color (1,1,1,1) for texture values outside the border.
